## Hooks.Hook type

Hook signature

Signature:

```typescript
export type Hook<T extends keyof Map & string> =
  | ((value?: T) => Map[T])
  | ((value?: T) => Partial<Map[T]>)
  | Map[T]
  | Partial<Map[T]>;
```
